text: Rajendra Chawla is an Indian actor. He is mostly known for such film as A Wednesday!, Mumbai Mirror, M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story, and Paisa Paisa, and the television series Saas Bina Sasural, Ghar Ki Lakshmi Betiyann, Maat Pitaah Ke Charnon Mein Swarg, Sanskaar - Dharohar Apnon Ki, and Bahu Hamari Rajni Kant. He can currently be seen in Sony SAB's Tera Yaar Hoon Main. ==Filmography== ===Television=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year !! Serial !! Role !! Language !!
